name: Breath Of Doom
description:
Many people see danger... Someone feels it... Someone in time, someone too late... Can you feel it in time? Are you hear Breath of Doom?

Gameplay:

You need defend personage of invisible bullets, that fly to you. You hear it but not see. Using shield with your mouse. Shield gets all sounds. Sound is everything!

Autors:

Yabra - game design, programming, sound design, music

Sanya - graphics

Slon - trailer

Testing by Nerok, Slon, VLADOS and Sanya
